title: Citi Launches the Trinidad and Tobago Investment Guide
summary: Port of Spain, Trinidad & Tobago - Citi announced the launch of the Trinidad and Tobago 2011-2012 Investment Guide - developed in partnership with the Minister of Finance, the Honorable Winston Dookeran.
tag-1: Citi Launches the Trinidad and Tobago Investment Guide
tag-2: Port of Spain, Trinidad & Tobago – Citi announced the launch of the Trinidad and Tobago 2011-2012 Investment Guide — developed in partnership with the Minister of Finance, the Honorable Winston Dookeran.
tag-3: The new guide is an updated version of the last guide produced in 1995. It was designed to be a comprehensive yet concise document that highlights key information on Trinidad & Tobago, e.g. economy, services, infrastructure as well as opportunities for investment in the country.
tag-4: Suresh Maharaj, Chairman of Citibank Trinidad & Tobago was pleased to be of service to the government. He said, "Our presence in Trinidad and Tobago for the past 45 years is testimony to the confidence the corporation has in the country, its economy and its people. It is against this backdrop of experience and the strong relationship with the Government of Trinidad and Tobago and other stakeholders that Citi embarked on the production of this investment guide."
tag-5: The Minister of Finance, the Honorable Winston Dookeran, was grateful for this initiative led by Citi. "I would like to thank Citi for this project, which has great impact to the economy of Trinidad and Tobago," he said. "The government also greatly appreciates the dedication and commitment of Citi over the years to the country and people of Trinidad and Tobago."
tag-6: The Investment Guide will be distributed to various Ministries including the Ministry of Finance and Ministry of Trade and Industry. It will also be made available on their websites as well as various business chambers.
tag-7: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
